summary.span: 提供基控件设计器类，用于扩展 Web 服务器控件的设计模式行为。

span.span: Provides a base control designer class for extending the design-mode behavior of a Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一个基控件设计器类，该类可以从继承并对其进行扩展，以在设计宿主（如）中为 Web 服务器控件提供设计时支持 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] 。The class provides a base control designer class that can be inherited from and extended to provide design-time support for a Web server control in a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]. 与早期版本相比，用于处理设计时呈现的对象模型通过以下新基类来提供对简化对象模型的访问权限：The object model for working with design-time rendering is improved over earlier versions, with the following new base classes to provide access to the simplified object model: - ，它不是新的，但已大幅提高。, which is not new, but has been greatly improved. - .. - .. ## 自动格式设置Automatic Formatting 您可以创建各种自动和预定义的格式，这可以简化将复杂样式更改应用于自定义 Web 服务器控件的页面开发人员的过程。You can create a variety of automatic and pre-defined formats that can simplify the process of page developers who are applying complex style changes to custom Web server controls. 例如， 从类派生的控件 提供了许多可供选择的自动格式。For example, the control, which derives from the class, provides many automatic formats from which to choose. 若要在自定义控件中实现和提供自动格式设置，请使用以下功能：To implement and provide automatic formatting in your custom controls, use the following features: - 属性。The property. - 方法。The method. - 类。The class. - 类。The class. ## 操作列出 (智能标记) Action Lists (Smart Tags) 操作列表是重要或广泛使用的任务的菜单，使用控件的页面开发人员可以在设计时用户界面中执行 (UI) ，如 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] 。Action lists are menus of important or widely used tasks that a page developer who uses a control can perform in a design-time user interface (UI), such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]. 例如，控件的设计时视图可以提供可用任务的菜单。For example, the design-time view of your control could provide a menu of available tasks. 这包括自动设置控件格式的任务。This includes a task to format the control automatically. 若要了解操作列表，请从以下功能开始：To learn about action lists, start with the following features: - 属性。The property. - 类。The class. - 方法。The method. - 类。The class. - 类。The class. - 类。The class. ## 控件设计器区域Control Designer Regions 区域是 Web 服务器控件的设计时视图中的可编辑区域。Regions are editable areas in the design-time view of a Web server control. 此功能可在设计时提供类似于所见即所得的模板内容、内部控件和属性的编辑。This feature offers WYSIWYG-like editing of the template content, inner controls, and properties at design time. 您可以让控件设计器在区域中创建控件，也可以使用工具箱将控件拖放到区域中。You can have the control designer create controls in regions or you can use the Toolbox to drag and drop controls into regions. 通过以下功能管理区域：Regions are managed with the following features: - 方法。The method. - 类。The class. - 类。The class. - 方法。The method. - 方法。The method. ## 模板Templates 用于创建用于设计时编辑模板化控件（如控件）的 UI 的模型已 从早期版本大大改进。The model for creating a UI for design-time editing of templated controls, such as the control, has been greatly improved from earlier versions. 您可以创建包含控件各个部分的模板的复杂自定义控件，您的自定义控件设计器可以帮助正在用以下功能修改模板的开发人员：You can create complex custom controls that include templates for various parts of the control, and your custom control designer can help page developers who are modifying templates with the following features: - 属性。The property. - 属性。The property. - 类。The class. ## 设计时呈现Design-Time Rendering 类具有以下方法，可支持 Web 服务器控件的设计时呈现。The class has the following methods to support design-time rendering of the Web server control. 其中的大多数方法与早期版本中的方法相同：Most of these methods are the same as in earlier versions: - 方法。The method. - 方法。The method. - 方法。The method. - 方法。The method. - 方法。The method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个从类派生的简单设计器类 。The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple designer class that derives from the class. 此控件设计器支持自定义 `TextControl` 类，并提供在设计时更改控件的文本大小的命令。This control designer supports a custom `TextControl` class and provides a command to change the text size of a control at design time. 控件设计器通过在类的对象声明中指定控件设计器，与控件相关联 `TextControl` 。The control designer is associated with the control by specifying the control designer in a object declaration on the `TextControl` class. 将属性更改从控件设计器保存到 HTML 标记的关键是在 `ToggleTextSize` 自定义类的方法中找到的 `ActionList` 。The key to persisting property changes from the control designer to the HTML markup is found in the `ToggleTextSize` method of the custom `ActionList` class. 若要尝试该示例，请将引用添加到 System.Design.dll 程序集并编译代码。To try the example, add a reference to the System.Design.dll assembly and compile the code. [!code-csharp[ControlDesignerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlDesignerSample/cs/TextControlDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlDesignerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlDesignerSample/vb/TextControlDesigner.vb#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[ControlDesignerSample#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlDesignerSample/cs/TextControlDesigner.aspx#8)] [!code-aspx-vb[ControlDesignerSample#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlDesignerSample/vb/TextControlDesigner.aspx#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可创建在设计时显示控件的错误消息的 HTML 标记。Use the method to create HTML markup to display an error message for a control at design time. 的值 `errorMessage` 指定在设计时向控件的用户显示的本地化字符串。The value for `errorMessage` specifies a localized string that is displayed to the user of the control at design time. 方法的类实现 返回一个具有两行的表，如下所示：The class implementation of the method returns a table with two rows, as follows: - 第一行包含对象属性的类型名称和站点名称 。The first row contains the type name and site name for the property of the object. - 第二行包含输入错误消息字符串。The second row contains the input error message string. 若要使用关联的异常生成错误消息的 HTML 标记，请使用 重载。To generate HTML markup for an error message with an associated exception, use the overload. 若要为异常生成 HTML 标记而不指定本地化的错误消息，请使用 方法。To generate HTML markup for an exception without specifying a localized error message, use the method.

para.span: 重载在功能上等效于调用 方法，并将设置为 。

span.span: The overload is functionally equivalent to calling the method with e set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可提供简单的 HTML 标记，该标记可用于在设计时显示控件的错误和异常详细信息。Use the method to provide simple HTML markup that can be used to display error and exception details for a control at design time. 的值 `errorMessage` 指定在设计时向控件的用户显示的本地化字符串。The value for `errorMessage` specifies a localized string that is displayed to the user of the control at design time. 方法的类实现 返回一个具有两行的表，如下所示：The class implementation of the method returns a table with two rows, as follows: - 第一行包含对象属性的类型名称和站点名称 。The first row contains the type name and site name for the property of the object. - 第二行包含输入错误消息和异常的 字符串。The second row contains the input error message and the string of the exception. 若要在不指定异常的情况下生成错误消息的 HTML 标记，请使用 重载。To generate HTML markup for an error message without specifying an exception, use the overload. 若要为异常生成 HTML 标记而不指定本地化的错误消息，请使用 方法。To generate HTML markup for an exception without specifying a localized error message, use the method.

para.span: 典型的设计模式是尝试通过关联的控件获取 HTML 标记，并在遇到错误时调用 方法。

span.span: The typical design pattern is to try to get HTML markup through the associated control, and then if an error is encountered, call the method.

para.span: 如果控件未返回任何标记，则调用 方法，如果未重写该方法以提供特定标记，则调用 方法，该方法应包含有关控件的类型和 ID 的信息。

span.span: If no markup is returned by the control, call the method, which if it is not overridden to provide specific markup, calls the method, which should contain information about the type and ID of the control.

span.span: Wraps a series of changes into a transaction, using the specified parameters that can be rolled back as a unit with the undo functionality of the design host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的实现将 通知设计宿主，该宿主由的 属性确定，在关联的 `component` 控件中发生更改，如果设计宿主未取消更改，则使用指定的调用指定的 `callback` ，然后 `context` 通知设计宿主更改已完成。The implementation of the method notifies the design host, which is determined by the property of `component`, that a change is occurring in the associated control and, if the change is not canceled by the design host, invokes the specified `callback` using the specified `context`, and then notifies the design host that the change has completed. 如果设计宿主或关联控件引发异常的静态 `Canceled` 异常字段 ，则在未调用的情况下取消事务 `callback` 。If the design host or the associated control throws a static `Canceled` exception field of a exception, the transaction is canceled without invoking `callback`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和控件创建一个简单的复合控件，以及用于 设置标签文本的属性以及 控件的、 和 属性 。The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple composite control with a and a control, together with properties to set the label text, and also the , , and properties of the control. 关联的控件设计器类创建三个 命令，每个命令都在控件上设置两个属性。An associated control designer class creates three commands, each of which sets two properties on the control. 通过使用 方法，您可以使用设计宿主（如）的撤消功能， [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] 将每个已完成的事务作为一个单元进行回滚。By using the method, you can use the undo functionality of the design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], to roll back each completed transaction as a unit. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的实现将 通知设计宿主，该宿主由的属性确定 ，在 `component` `member` 关联控件的指定 (属性或) 方法发生更改的情况下，如果设计宿主未取消更改，则 `callback` 使用指定的作为参数调用指定的，然后 `context` 通知设计宿主更改已完成。The implementation of the method notifies the design host, which is determined by the property of `component`, that a change is occurring to the specified `member` (property or method) of the associated control and, if the change is not canceled by the design host, invokes the specified `callback` using the specified `context` as the argument, and then notifies the design host that the change has completed. 如果设计宿主或关联控件引发异常的静态 `Canceled` 异常字段，则 在未调用的情况下取消事务 `callback` 。If the design host or associated control throws a static `Canceled` exception field of a exception, the transaction is canceled without invoking `callback`. ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参阅 。For a code example, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 设计图面上，该事件由设计宿主为控件上的某些操作引发。The event is raised by the design host for certain actions on a control in the design surface. 例如，以下条件引发事件：For example, an event is raised for the following conditions: - 用户单击控件。The user clicks the control. - 控件设计器将在设计图面上绘制。The control designer paints on the design surface. - 用户进入或退出控件的模板编辑模式。The user enters or exits template editing mode for the control. 类提供用于处理事件的默认委托 。The class supplies a default delegate to handle the event. 派生自的类 重写 方法，以处理用户单击控件时引发的事件。Classes deriving from override the method to process events that are raised when the user clicks a control. 方法允许派生类在不附加委托的情况下处理事件。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 方法的默认实现将 返回，而不执行任何处理。The default implementation of the method returns without performing any processing. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何对控件的可 单击区域中的事件使用处理程序，并使用 对象标识所单击的区域。The following code example shows how to use a handler for the event in a clickable region of the control and use a object to identify the region that is being clicked. 此代码示例是类的更大代码示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger code example for the class. [!code-csharp[SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner/CS/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner/VB/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner.vb#4)]

para.span: 如果不为 null，则在属性中指定单击的区域（如果有） 。

span.span: If is not null, the clicked region, if any, is specified in the property.

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, make sure that you call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 设计图面上，该事件由设计宿主为控件上的某些操作引发。The event is raised by the design host for certain actions on a control in the design surface. 例如，以下条件引发事件：For example, an event is raised for the following conditions: - 用户单击控件。The user clicks the control. - 设计宿主请求在设计图面上呈现关联控件的 HTML 标记。The design host requests HTML markup to render the associated control on the design surface. - 用户进入或退出控件的模板编辑模式。The user enters or exits template editing mode for the control. 类提供用于处理事件的默认委托 。The class supplies a default delegate to handle the event. 派生自的类 应设置 值并重写 方法，以处理设计宿主在设计图面上绘制控件时引发的事件。Classes deriving from should set the value and override the method to process events that are raised when the design host draws the control on the design surface. 方法允许派生类在不附加委托的情况下处理事件。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 方法的默认实现将 返回，而不执行任何处理。The default implementation of the method returns without performing any processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每当克隆项时，可能会有一些内部数据结构（如 `meta:` 属性），控件设计器应将这些结构包含在克隆的控件中。Whenever an item is cloned, there might be some internal data structures, such as `meta:` attributes, that should be included in the cloned control by the control designer. 页面开发人员可能会将 `meta:` 属性添加到控件的标记中，并且没有任何原因，使控件能够区分这些标记可能是什么。A page developer might add `meta:` attributes to the markup of a control and there is no way, nor is there a reason, for the control to distinguish what those tags might be. 因此，如果您的控件设计器提供了一种在将更改应用于页面之前编辑复杂属性或格式的方法，您将创建该控件的一个克隆，将原始控件和克隆传递给此 方法，然后在将更改保存到标记时， `meta:` 还将保留所有特性。Therefore, if your control designer provides a way to edit complex properties or formats before applying changes to a page, you would create a clone of the control, pass both the original control and the clone to this method, and then, when the changes are persisted to the tag, all `meta:` attributes are also persisted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性为 `true` ，则 属性将返回控件的临时副本。If the property is `true`, the property returns a temporary copy of the control. 对临时控件所做的更改不会保留在文档中。Changes to the temporary control are not persisted to the document. 如果 属性为 `false` ，则 属性返回控件的属性的实例 。If the property is `false`, the property returns an instance of the property for the control. 更改对控件实例的更改。Changes to the instance of the control are persisted. 对象中的设置 用于设置属性的值 。The setting in the object is used to set the value of the property. 因此，此 设置确定基类中的属性返回的控件类型 。Therefore, the setting determines the type of control that is returned by the property in the base class. 如果 未在控件设计器声明中指定，则 对象行为等效于将 属性指定为 `false` 。If the is not specified in the control designer declaration, the object behavior is equivalent to specifying the property as `false`.

summary.span: 获取或设置可用于预览设计时 HTML 标记的 Web 服务器控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a Web server control that can be used for previewing the design-time HTML markup.

value.span: 基类用于生成设计时 HTML 标记的 对象。

span.span: A object used by the base class to generate design-time HTML markup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使用 属性来确定其返回值。The property uses the property to determine its return value. 如果 属性为 `true` ，则 属性将返回控件的临时副本。If the property is `true`, the property returns a temporary copy of the control. 对临时控件所做的更改不会持久保存。Changes to the temporary control are not persisted. 如果 属性为 `false` ，则 属性返回控件的属性的实例 。If the property is `false`, the property returns an instance of the property for the control. 更改对控件实例的更改。Changes to the instance of the control are persisted. 对象中的设置 用于设置属性的值 。The setting in the object is used to set the value of the property. 因此，此 设置确定基类中的属性返回的控件类型 。Therefore, the setting determines the type of control that is returned by the property in the base class. 如果 未在控件设计器声明中指定，则 对象行为等效于将 属性指定为 `false` 。If the is not specified in the control designer declaration, the object behavior is equivalent to specifying the property as `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性标记控件设计器 。The following code example demonstrates how to mark a control designer with the attribute. 此代码示例从类派生 Web 服务器控件 ，并将该控件与自定义控件设计器实现相关联。The code example derives a Web server control from the class and associates the control with a custom control designer implementation. 控件设计器类声明标记为 `SupportsPreviewControl` 特性设置为 `true` 。The control designer class declaration is marked with the `SupportsPreviewControl` attribute set to `true`. 控件设计器将重写 方法，然后 在设计时以斜体显示控件的属性。The control designer overrides the method, and then displays the property of the control in italic at design time. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute/CS/supportspreviewdesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute/VB/supportspreviewdesigner.vb#1)]
